userprofilev2-desc: Text that explains the purpose of the extension on Special:Version.
userprofilev2-selectavatar: Button text for uploading an avatar.
userprofilev2-avatarchanged: Text that displays in a bubble notification when an avatar has been successfully changed.
userprofilev2-avatardeleted: Message shown in bubble notification when an avatar has been successfully deleted.
userprofilev2-user-locked: Warning message shown on profile of a user profile when their account is locked via CentralAuth.
userprofilev2-edit-profile: Button text for editing your profile details.
userprofilev2-apierror-forbidden: Error message returned by the API when a user doesn't have permission to change an avatar.
userprofilev2-apierror-invalidpermission: Error message returned when a user doesn’t have permission to edit another user’s profile information.
userprofilev2-apierror-nofile: Error message returned by the API when someone tried to change an avatar but no file was sent with the request.
userprofilev2-apierror-ratelimited: Error message returned by the API when someone is rate limited from uploading images.
userprofilev2-apierror-invalidusername: Error message returned by the API when someone tried to change the profile of a non-existing user.
userprofilev2-about-me: Label text for "about me" input box
userprofilev2-about-me-placeholder: Placeholder text for the "about me" input box
userprofilev2-discord-placeholder: Placeholder text for the "discord" input box
userprofilev2-twitter-placeholder: Placeholder text for the "twitter" input box
userprofilev2-mastodon-placeholder: Placeholder text for the "mastodon" input box
userprofilev2-about-me-help: Help text for the "about me" username input.
userprofilev2-mastodon-help: Help text for the "mastodon" username input.
userprofilev2-twitter-help: Help text for the "twitter" username input.
userprofilev2-discord-help: Help text for the "discord" username input.
userprofilev2-showglobalgroups: Label text for checkbox that toggles whether global groups are shown on a profile.
userprofilev2-showglobaleditcount: Label text for checkbox that toggles whether global edits are shown on a profile.
userprofilev2-showglobalgroupshelp: Help text for checkbox that toggles whether global groups are shown on a profile.
userprofilev2-showglobaleditcounthelp: Help text for checkbox that toggles whether global edits are shown on a profile.
userprofilev2-edit: Label text for profile edit button
userprofilev2-editavatar: Label text for avatar edit popup.
userprofilev2-edit-back: Alt text for the back buttons in certain places in the profile edit popup.
userprofilev2-deleteavatar: Label text for the avatar delete button.
userprofilev2-helptext: Help text for the profile editing interface.
